title: 107_s2757
content: Prescription Drug Benefit Act of 2002 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to: (1) provide for Medicare coverage of outpatient prescription drugs. And (2) require the revision of Medicare supplemental health insurance (Medigap) policy benefit packages to replace the currently available outpatient prescription drug coverage with coverage that complements but does not duplicate the coverage otherwise available under Medicare.
